main event: On December 3-4, 1957, a military report detailed a sighting of a round object the size of a dime, colored orange and yellow on top, near Baffin Island, Canada.
interesting points: The object was able to hover with no visible disturbance., The sighting coincided with weather balloon releases from Greenland., Winds on the sighting dates were reported to potentially bring balloons over the sighting area., The weather personnel were involved in analyzing the sightings' connection to weather balloons., The round object was observed at dusk.
sighted object: a round object the size of a dime, orange and yellow on top
witness description: Military personnel involved in the report
